abstracts.cdata!:
This project paper seeks the approval of
            the Executive Directors to provide an additional grant to
            the Islamic Republic of Afghanistan for the Strengthening
            Health Activities for the Rural Poor Project (SHARP). The
            additional financing will help to cover a portion of the
            funding gap identified during project appraisal and enable
            the implementation of components one and two to deliver
            basic health and hospital services to the vast majority of
            the poor (84 percent) and of the overall population (80
            percent) who live in rural areas. This is fully consistent
            with the Crisis Response Window (CRW) objective of providing
            financial assistance to protect core spending on health.
            There will be no changes to the project's development
            objective, results framework, and implementation arrangements.
